com.interpss.core.algo.impl
Class BMatrixSolver

java.lang.Object
  com.interpss.core.algo.impl.BMatrixSolver
Direct Known Subclasses:
DclfSolver
public class BMatrixSolver
extends java.lang.Object

An AclfNet B matrix solver implementation. It caches the B1 and B11 matrix for improving performance
